info.name: Wordy
info.attribution:
The game layout, game pieces, images, and Wordy logo were done by LawDawg96 and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.
The library image contains a photograph from https://pixabay.com/photos/printing-plate-letters-font-type-1030849/ and is available under the Pixabay License.

Letter distribution and point values from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrabble_letter_distributions.
info.description: Use letter tiles to build words with extra points for playing in certain locations. Play until tile bag runs out. Most points wins.
info.helpText:
Players take seats.

Start game (and choose language) by selecting button with dashed outline of globe.

Play tiles on board. To exchange tiles, manually flip tiles upside down in hand then drag to swap holder. Press swap icon. New cards are added to hand; swapped cards are returned to pile and it is shuffled.

Click on scoreboard to enter score for that play.
info.language: de-DE, el-GR, en-US, es, fr-FR, it-IT, pt-BR
